title: Barren Sea
description: An accident leaves Natalie White, a successful author of fictional survival stories, adrift at sea with only her dog as company. While she struggles to apply the survival skills she has made a living writing about, her fiance begins the search for a single raft lost in the nearly 30 million square miles which make up the Atlantic Ocean.Barren Sea is a novelette about the perseverance of a young woman and her dog as she tries to survive in a seemingly hopeless situation.
author: K.L. Sullivan
